package.name: GroupDocsViewer
package.summary: GroupDocs Viewer allow to view documents and images from GroupDocs Account
package.description: GroupDocs Viewer allow to view documents and images from GroupDocs Account. Functionalities like File Upload and GroupDocs Acc. File Browsing avalible from "ver. 1.3". GroupDocs is a next generation Document Management solution that makes it easier for businesses to collaborate, share and work with documents online. So, organise, view, annotate, compare, assemble and share all your documents with Magento For more details go to: http://groupdocs.com
